document.masterDocTitle: Review of the genus Diestramima Storozhenko, 1990 (Orthoptera: Rhaphidophoridae: Aemodogryllinae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the genus Diestramima Storozhenko, 1990 (Orthoptera: Rhaphidophoridae: Aemodogryllinae) from China

bibRefCitation.refString: Liu, X. W. & Zhang, W. N. (2001) Orthoptera: Tettigonioidea, Rhahidophoroidea and Gryllacridoidea. In: Wu, H. & Pan, C. W. (Eds.), Insects of Tianmushan National Nature Reserve. Science Press, Beijing, pp. 90 - 102.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Diestramima intermedia : Liu & Zhang, 2001
. Insects of Tianmushan National Nature Reserve , 96, 100; Gorochov & Storozhenko, 2015 . Zoosystematica Rossica , 24(1): 68; Qin, Wang, Liu & Li, 2016 . Zootaxa , 4126(4): 520.
